content.rendered:
Franchise

Moti Mahal Delux has revolutionized the way people perceive Mughlai cuisine in fine dining. As an authentic Mughlai restaurant and bar we offer an environment that encourages guests to mingle by providing unique elements such as multi-level indoor and outdoor seating, creative interior décor, and live music. Fine dining meets casual comfort in a relaxed yetvibrant atmosphere.

Traditional family recipes, using the freshest ingredients and homemade spices to prepare our signature Mughlai dishes, inspire the entrees. This blend of fine food and entertainment makes Moti Mahal Delux the perfect meeting place for friends, family, out of towners and business magnates.

Our concept differentiation can be found throughout the restaurant’s design and product offerings, which have been established to make Moti Mahal Delux a creative and repeatable concept that can be successful in many markets throughout the country.
